title: patcher loads infinitely

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hey everyone i had an issue with the beta cleint where it would say failed to load URL(then a long URL) and an error code my friend said to switch back to the legacy client but now it is stuck on the patcher loading screen (the 7.7 patch installed and when i re loaded the patcher im stuck with the photo above, I have no idea how to fix it...

also unsure if related but i cant connect to the gamejolt client or steam store either (however steam games such as TF2 work)

I have tried:
connecting to different internet
uninstall/reinstall
running as admin

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having problems reaching different services.  It could be due to some stability or maybe some update that is forcing your connection to block off these services.  My suggestion would be to use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, along with the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help auto-configure your firewall settings.  Let me know if that does the trick!
